name: @danielkalen/taglist
description: Tag-style key:value lists with dynamic value calculation

scripts.postversion: echo \'$(json -f package.json version)\' > .version.coffee && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:pretty && npm run build:ugly
scripts.build:ugly: simplyimport -i src/taglist.coffee | coffee -b -s -c > dist/taglist.pretty.js && uglifyjs dist/taglist.pretty.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false -o dist/taglist.js
scripts.build:pretty: simplyimport -i src/taglist.coffee | coffee -b -s -c > dist/taglist.pretty.js && cp -f dist/taglist.pretty.js dist/taglist.js

author: danielkalen
